item.title: Target’s stock rocked after triple-miss earnings report amid ‘unique’ challenges
item.description: Target’s stock set to suffer worst day in more than two years after profit, revenue, comparable sales and the outlook were all below expectations.

item.title: Mortgage rates are near 7%, but buyers are making a comeback
item.description: Mortgage applications rose 1.7% in the last week, the Mortgage Bankers Association said.

item.title: As Nvidia reports, here’s the history of what happens next after ten giant stocks outperform
